phrases: Send the lost promises to the stars
My memories will not fade away
yotsuba no clover sagashinagara kimi no kao
I steal a glance at you as we look for four-leaf clovers,
chirari nusumi mite wa me o sorasu
yasashii ame wa furu watashitachi no ue ni
The gentle rain falls above our heads
surechigau hito no kazu dake dramatic ni naru no
as it becomes as dramatic as the number of people passing by
I wonder if we will ever be able to
itsuka mata aeru hi ga kurukashira
reunite with those precious things that were broken
The scars that were left behind will not go away
Show us how to do this!
There is nothing to be afraid of.
They would not let us feed it like this if it easily bit people.
I wonder if dinosaurs were like this...
There you go talking like a child again while trying to act cool!
But this place is so empty that it is almost uncomfortable.
Actually, could it be that we have this place all to ourselves today?
Can they keep operating like this, considering the cost of the feed and such?
It is actually from a warm country, but it is been brought to such a cold place.
There is a good number of giraffes in Japan, but it is not like it will ever meet another of its kind...
Why did Mister Giraffe have to be brought to a place like this?!
Probably so kids in countries where giraffes cannot normally be seen can see them.
Then why is not anyone here?!
Seeing her face and her unblinking eyes, I realize that she was sketching with her eyes, ears, nose, and brain.
After memorizing this whole scene with the giraffe, she will probably spit it all out onto a canvas back in Tokyo...
It seems she is done memorizing it all.
Want to try giving it a carrot?
You are going to get an upset stomach.
Hagu-chan, get a hold of yourself!
Hold on a second, I will go buy another one!
It is just that your kick seems to have gotten even sharper.
Just make sure you are not so quick to hit your superiors and coworkers once you are working for a company.
I-I will not do such a thing!
I have also been turned down by every company I have applied to so far.
I am still waiting for my results myself.
Why do not you have a seat?
It seems you have wanted to tell me something since yesterday.
Someone from another office who I worked with told me...
It was you, was not it, Sensei?
When you put it that way, it sounds risque, does not it?
I was probably just on the lookout...
I was a kid from the country who liked to draw, even though I was not that good.
I had no confidence, but lots of pride.
Because of that, I did not fit in anywhere and just concentrated on drawing on canvas.
Even when he was laughing casually, being with him made you feel like he could see right through you.
But I did not feel uncomfortable with that at all.
Then we worked part time together and moved to a run-down apartment, though it had a yard.
It is a magpie and a white-eye.
We are taking care of a lost dog!!
And towards the end of our third year...
Rika was a girl from Hokkaido who was terribly good at drawing.
She was known around campus as the Snow Queen due to her beauty and unfriendliness...
Apparently, she is been half disowned by her family.
She seems to be really tired from her work.
She is so thin that it is only skin and bone.
Nabe: traditional Japanese meal with a variety of ingredients cooked together in a hot pot.
Let us have us three eat together.
Oh, that is a good idea!
Harada, let her eat at her leisure.
Looking back, Harada might have picked up both Rika and me.
Just like those cats and dogs.
From then on, the three of us lived together in that apartment...
Every day was the same, as if it was a matter of fact, and things were ridiculously fun.
I am sorry for coming in without asking.
If a passing truck driver had not pulled Rika out, she would have burned up too.
It was the night after the opening party for the store they had designed, and they were both really tired.
If they had stayed at the party without going home...
If they had left before it started snowing...
If they had left their car there and taken a taxi...
If they had not taken that road...
As if she was being cornered by the possibilities that could no longer be realized...
I could not leave Rika's side.
I commuted to work from that office and came back to help her work at night.
I was worried that I would lose even Rika.
I could not stand the thought.
Then why did you leave her side?
Rika began trying to distance herself from even me.
Harada's existence was too significant for both her and me.
When Rika and I were together, we could not help but reminisce about when all three of us were together.
Even I began to think that it might have been better to let her follow Harada.
Once I started thinking that, I could not be around her any longer.
I thought that I need to get away, cool my mind, and stabilize the situation.
Why did it have to be me?
Out of all the guys I knew, you seemed to be the one...
That is a terrible way to put it.
And I never would have expected it to turn out like this.
Let us ride on the ferris wheel!
Oh yeah, Rika has already asked me to introduce a new part-timer to her.
My actual acceptance letter has not come yet.
Rika said that you would definitely be accepted.
I do not know how to put it...
Harada and Rika were different from something as simple as friends or lovers to me.
We lived in the same room, ate the same food, and breathed the same air.
I came to think of them as a part of my body.
I am going to say something out of line.
I end up taking advantage of him because I know that he likes me.
You should just avail yourself to him and take advantage of him.
I push away and hurt him but still keep him by my side.
It is not an acceptable way for people to interact.
To think that I was being bolstered by his wounded heart...
That is why I was happy to hear that he decided to leave this place.
Four more days until the due date...
There is no way I am going to finish.
That is why I told you to start early.
Yamada, how can you be so calm?!
I mean, I have already submitted my graduate thesis.
I heard that you made an amazing piece, Yamada-san.
I-It is the legendary large bowl!
Shouda-sensei said that it excited him so much that his blood pressure went up.
Oh no, it was just somewhat big.
But you could not get a job, right?
Note: Morita writes the name of his murder with tea on the floor (Yamada).
The going is t-t-ough for g-g-g-girls right now.
B-B-But y-you are sticking around as a g-g-g-g-graduate student, r-right, Y-Yamada?
My dad actually told me to carry on the family sake business with my older brother, but...
But I thought that as a woman, I would not be able to handle being a sake maker.
I will try again in two years after I obtain more qualifications as a graduate student.
If it is about qualifications, you can always talk to me.
Well then, the rest of you should get to work.
You only have four more days.
Even if you pass your employment exam, it would be silly if you could not graduate.
I will do my best, too!
There is no time for you to play around.
Hurry and finish your graduate thesis!
At this rate, my life will end first!
Sender: Tokudaiji Date: 20XX/01/XX Hanamoto Research Lab Regarding the Field Work
Hanamoto-kun, I am awaiting your response regarding the field work.
I am coming to Tokyo this week, so I would like to speak to you directly.
Let us get some fried rolls and croquette bread at the Maruei Bakery!
Did not I tell you to carry this around with you?
Oh, it is my cell phone.
Just why do you think I synchronized it with my car's navigation system?
It is been a while, Takaido-san.
But why did they call you directly instead of our employment department?
Well, I sometimes helped them out when we worked at the same place.
So you have already been semi-tested during the past year and a half.
And the graduate thesis is due in 30 minutes!
He left the last 10 and disappeared!
Now that I think about it, I have not seen him in the last two or three days.
I-It is a statue of himself.
But it is not finished yet.
Then we can entitle it Useless.
The word hanninmae (useless) literally means half a man.
Shuu-chan, get a hold of yourself!
B-But while I am still alive, I cannot accept something that is incomplete.
Who in the world did this to Gramps?!
Well then, congratulations on submitting your graduate thesis and emergency thesis.
So in the end, the only one out of this group who will go away is Mayama.
Even though it is a guy like him, it is a little sad to see him leave.
Nope, he will not go away.
After all, he hates being left out!
As expected, it ends up like this.
About the new part-timer Rika asked me to look for...
Should it be a guy or a girl?
It involves physical labor, so a guy would be better.
Ah, but putting an unfamiliar brat in that room with Rika-san...?
Ah, but on the other hand, she will have to be more courteous around a girl.
Do you know of a company called Art Craft?
I have worked with them a few times before.
She will be working with them on a cooperative project for a while and apparently does not need a part-timer for now.
There is nothing to worry about if that Asai-san is with her!
Let us go home and sleep.
Rika, I sort of understand why you were not able to let go of Mayama.
Well then, Mayama, I am leaving now, so please lock the door behind you.
And make sure that she does not need to get drunk like that anymore.
Why did you fall in love wih me?
So I have been thinking that I needed to turn you down properly if you ever told me that you liked me.
I thought that you would go away somewhere if I turned you down.
When I looked at you, it hurt me because it was like looking at myself.
I thought, Ah, I wonder if I look like that from Rika-san's perspective...
But that does not matter anymore.
Even though I tried to act cool, I could not change a thing.
And I was not able to give up on her.
Yamada, are you drooling on me?
I rub my heavy eyelids to reveal
A future in the shape of pastels
As my expressions were pulled in closer
Say, what was it that we were looking for again?
That is right, exactly when were those days
bokura ga inryoku ni sakarai nagara deatta koro
When we used to meet, denying the attraction that was forming between us?
sore ga waltz no you dane fushigi sa
It is like a waltz, is not it?
sasayaku youna komorebi no kousaten de
futari waltz no youni ne mawari nagara
Where the whispering sunlight falls through the trees and meet.
Next episode: We look for a miracle.
